meanings.definition: To anoint with oil or ointment as a religious rite.
meanings.sent1: During the ceremony, the priest will anele the newborn baby's forehead with holy oil.
meanings.sent2: She likes to anele her skin with moisturizer every night before bed.
meanings.sent3: The cat decided to anele itself with fish oil, thinking it was a fancy spa treatment.
meanings.sent4: The sun seemed to anele the sky with golden hues as it set behind the mountains.
meanings.sent5: The chef would anele the dish with a drizzle of truffle oil for a luxurious touch.

meanings.definition: To apply oil or ointment to something.
meanings.sent1: He will anele the hinges of the door to stop them from squeaking.
meanings.sent2: The athlete would anele his muscles with warming balm before the race.
meanings.sent3: The gardener decided to anele the plants with organic fertilizer for better growth.
meanings.sent4: The artist would anele the canvas with various colors to create a beautiful painting.
meanings.sent5: She would anele her hair with coconut oil to keep it healthy and shiny.

meanings.sent1: The anele used in the ceremony had a soothing fragrance.
meanings.sent2: She bought a bottle of anele to use for her skincare routine.
meanings.sent3: The magical properties of the anele made it a popular choice among healers.
meanings.sent4: The ancient scroll mentioned a special recipe for an anele with mystical powers.
meanings.sent5: The anele was passed down through generations as a symbol of blessings and protection.
